fields.summary: iOS: Remove instance NavigationGroup from KitchenSink

comments.body:
Tested and verified is not removed
Mac osx 10.9.5 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409261245
Titanium SDK, build: 3.4.0.v20140925164115
acs@1.0.18
alloy 1.5.0-rc5
install@0.1.7
npm@1.4.23
sudo@1.0.3
titanium 3.4.0-rc4
titanium-code-processor@1.1.1
Xcode6.0.1 (6A317)
iPad Air iOS 8
iPhone6 + iOS 8.0.2
KS ks <guid>28a706e9-4130-4acb-bc76-9494255a9279</guid> version 3.3.1
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
